title: Smart Data Models - ROS2 sensor_msgs/BatteryState
description: Represents the state of a battery, including voltage, current, charge, capacity, and health status

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SensorMsgsBatteryState

header.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Message header with timestamp and frame information

voltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage in Volts (V). NaN if not available

temperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature in Celsius (°C). NaN if not available

current.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current in Amperes (A). Negative indicates discharging. NaN if not available

charge.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current charge in Ampere-hours (Ah). NaN if not available

capacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total capacity in Ampere-hours (Ah). NaN if not available

designCapacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Design capacity in Ampere-hours (Ah). NaN if not available

percentage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Charge percentage (0.0 to 1.0). NaN if not available

present.description: Property. True if the battery is present

cellVoltage.description: Property. Individual cell voltages in Volts (V). Empty array if not available

cellTemperature.description: Property. Individual cell temperatures in Celsius (°C). Empty array if not available
